definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: She is going to have her birthday party at home.
sentences.chinese: 她將在家裏擧行她的生日派對。

sentences.english: It is considered that PBOC would like to encourage people to shift their money into fixed-term savings.
sentences.chinese: 市場認爲，此擧旨在鼓勵民衆將資金轉入定期存款。
